name: Freeze, (Don't) Move
description:
Chronus, the time magus, has been trapped in a dungeon full of monsters and demons. He doesn't have anything to rely on, neither weapons, books, nor friends, except one thing, time pause spell. He can cast the spell whenever he stay put on one place. Help Chronus escape from those horrifying monsters and survive in the dungeon as long as you can!

If you want to see the source code, check the following link:

https://gitlab.com/rafiftaris/gamejam
